results.title: Une Nuit a L'opera
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Le Tresor des Hollandais”.
Stephane is locked up on the roof of the Opera House with the real jewels still in his bag. After owning up to Morales, he is forced to return to the Opera and make a second attempt of substitution under the watchful eye of Lulu, Morales’ accomplice. As they reach the dressing rooms, they are interrupted by a night watchman doing his round.

Credits: Director, Philippe Agostini; writer, Odette Joyeux; photography, Christian Petard; music, Georges Auric; choreography, Michel Descombey; costumes, Pierre Balmain.
Cast: Claude Bessy, Claude Ariel, Catherine Bouchy, Pierre Didier, Felix Marten, Jacques Fabbri, Robert Manuel.

results.title: Un 'diam' Pour Jacinthe
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Le Tresor des Hollandais”.
Alerted by Inspector Boudot, the Canadian Police starts to follow Stephane. Gloria manages to speak to Olympe about Stephane’s trouble with both Morales and the law. She also tells her where the jewels have been hidden.

Credits: Director, Philippe Agostini; writer, Odette Joyeux; photography, Christian Petard; music, Georges Auric; choreography, Michel Descombey; costumes, Pierre Balmain.
Cast: Claude Bessy, Claude Ariel, Catherine Bouchy, Pierre Didier, Felix Marten, Jacques Fabbri, Robert Manuel.

results.title: Sur les Bords du Saint-Laurent
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Le Tresor des Hollandais”.
Today is the day for Jacinthe and Bicou to present for their dance exam. Jacinthe gives her precious ring to Bicou’s father for tightening. He is quick to realise that the ring is not a prop but a high quality diamond.

Credits: Director, Philippe Agostini; writer, Odette Joyeux; photography, Christian Petard; music, Georges Auric; choreography, Michel Descombey; costumes, Pierre Balmain.
Cast: Claude Bessy, Claude Ariel, Catherine Bouchy, Pierre Didier, Felix Marten, Jacques Fabbri, Robert Manuel.

results.title: Les Anges de la Route
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Le Tresor des Hollandais”.
Olympe and the last members of the Corps de Ballet are finally on their way to the airport. On the roof of their car, they are carrying a huge accessories basket containing Coppelia and the treasure. Not far behind, Stephane and Lulu are making sure that the basket duly goes through customs. Stephane who was due to take his cabaret show to Las Vegas is informed by Morales that he must follow the ballet to Canada and supervise the return of the real jewels to the Canadian contact. Meanwhile, the injured nightwatchman is making interesting revelations to Inspector Boudot.

Credits: Director, Philippe Agostini; writer, Odette Joyeux; photography, Christian Petard; music, Georges Auric; choreography, Michel Descombey; costumes, Pierre Balmain.
Cast: Claude Bessy, Claude Ariel, Catherine Bouchy, Pierre Didier, Felix Marten, Jacques Fabbri, Robert Manuel.

results.title: Le Sac a Malices
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Le Tresor des Hollandais”.
The Canadian Police now suspects Olympe to have run away with the real jewels. Stephane must hand back an empty bag to his accomplices. Lulu and Morales make a last attempt at terrorising the children into handing back the necklace and the ring.

Credits: Director, Philippe Agostini; writer, Odette Joyeux; photography, Christian Petard; music, Georges Auric; choreography, Michel Descombey; costumes, Pierre Balmain.
Cast: Claude Bessy, Claude Ariel, Catherine Bouchy, Pierre Didier, Felix Marten, Jacques Fabbri, Robert Manuel.

results.title: Le Nouveau Monde
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Le Tresor des Hollandais”.
On arrival in Canada, Olympe arouses suspiscion from the Canadian Customs. Stephane is considering abadonning Morales and his plans, but the threat to compromise Olympe with the smuggling of stolen goods is enough to keep him going. Lulu is still trying, not so subtly, to snatch the necklace from the children,

Credits: Director, Philippe Agostini; writer, Odette Joyeux; photography, Christian Petard; music, Georges Auric; choreography, Michel Descombey; costumes, Pierre Balmain.
Cast: Claude Bessy, Claude Ariel, Catherine Bouchy, Pierre Didier, Felix Marten, Jacques Fabbri, Robert Manuel.

results.title: Le Dernier Scalp
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Le Tresor des Hollandais”.
Stephane is so filled with guilt that he wants to reveal all to Olympe before he gets her compromised further. The second substitution of jewels turns out to just as problematic as the first one. The children return the necklace to the props department of the Opera House. Jacinthe is allowed to keep a ring from the treasure, much to Lulu’s dismay.

Credits: Director, Philippe Agostini; writer, Odette Joyeux; photography, Christian Petard; music, Georges Auric; choreography, Michel Descombey; costumes, Pierre Balmain.
Cast: Claude Bessy, Claude Ariel, Catherine Bouchy, Pierre Didier, Felix Marten, Jacques Fabbri, Robert Manuel.

results.title: Le 5eme Dessous
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Le Tresor des Hollandais”.
The children are taken by force by Lulu and led underneath the Opera House. Lulu demands to be taken to the props department and the jewels. The Police is searching the whole House.

Credits: Director, Philippe Agostini; writer, Odette Joyeux; photography, Christian Petard; music, Georges Auric; choreography, Michel Descombey; costumes, Pierre Balmain.
Cast: Claude Bessy, Claude Ariel, Catherine Bouchy, Pierre Didier, Felix Marten, Jacques Fabbri, Robert Manuel.

results.title: La Substitution
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Le Tresor des Hollandais”.
A famous collection of jewels dubbed ‘Le Tresor des Hollandais’ is stolen between Asterdam and London. The jewels are now in possession of Morales, a night club owner in Paris. He employs Stephane, a young ballet dancer whose career has been shattered by injury. Stephane still has his entries at the Paris Opera House and Ballet School where his younger brother Bicou is also studying to be a dancer. Morales is using Stephane to subtitute the real jewels to the fake one worn by a mannequin used in the performances of the ballet ‘Coppelia’. The company is on the eve of a tour of Canada and Coppelia is to be used to smuggle the precious stones into the country. But on the night of the substitution nothing goes according to plan.

Credits: Director, Philippe Agostini; writer, Odette Joyeux; photography, Christian Petard; music, Georges Auric; choreography, Michel Descombey; costumes, Pierre Balmain.
Cast: Claude Bessy, Claude Ariel, Catherine Bouchy, Pierre Didier, Felix marten, Jacques Fabbri, Robert Manuel.

results.title: La Fille Aux Yeux D'email
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Le Tresor des Hollandais”.
Stephane is still trying to operate the subitution of jewels in spite of the constant interruptions of Bicou and his best friend Jacinthe. He hopes to be out of the Opera House just in time to reach ‘L’oiseau de feu’, the cabaret owned by Morales wher he performs his dance number with Gloria. Instead, he finds himself locked up on the roof of the Opera House.

Credits: Director, Philippe Agostini; writer, Odette Joyeux; photography, Christian Petard; music, Georges Auric; choreography, Michel Descombey; costumes, Pierre Balmain.
Cast: Claude Bessy, Claude Ariel, Catherine Bouchy, Pierre Didier, Felix marten, Jacques Fabbri, Robert Manuel.
